reviews.reviewText:
So the piece that attracted me to this package versus the other Canon packages on Amazon was the 3 included lenses. I should have known better. It DOES come with the 1 Canon kit lens. The other 2 lenses are XIT brand and the two of them together can be purchased for less than $20. They actually make the pictures worse. Also, just to note, these are not stand alone lenses. They screw onto the front of the lens like a filter would. These are completely not usable for any kind of quality pictures. An average point and shoot camera takes higher quality pictures than you will get through these lenses.

If this is your first DSLR, the kit provides a decent value. All of the components are cheap, but will give you an idea if those are things you will use and should replace with better versions.

The camera itself is (so far) awesome. The camera alone would have been a 5 star purchase. The package alone would be a 2 star purchase. The way it's listed and pictured is deceptive. Overall, it's worth the $10 over just the camera, but be sure to keep your expectations low.

All the included components are as follows:

$10.69 xit macro lens xt58wab
$8.93 xit telephoto lens xt2x58
$19.75 vivitar large gadget bag
$22.46 xit tripod xt60trb
$4.50 vivitar 4in pocket tripod
$9.16 transcend 16gb flash card
$16.99 transcend 32gb flash card
$8.68 xit remote shutter release
$4.93 xit SD/microSD card reader
$7.46 pro series digital filter set
$3.95 lens cap keeper (stick on)
$2.94 xit universal screen protector
$3.99 xit digital ultraviolet filter
$3.00 vivitar cleaning kit and card wallet
$14.95 slave flash

Total accessories: $142.38

$449 Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera Kit with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Lens (Black)

reviews.reviewTitle: Canon is great, but beware the other stuff.
reviews.reviewText:
First things first: I love the camera. I have been using it for about a month now, and it has been wonderful. It is a fantastic first time camera and does a great job at helping you learn it. The rating is due to what comes with the camera, so please beware.

Pros: The SD cards alone provide good value, as they can get expensive as you need bigger cards, for a first-timer, and as long as you aren't shooting raw+jpeg like I am, you won't need anything else. Also helps to mention you get a sd card wallet and a usb reader/writer. The uv and other filters are also nice if you want to use filters in your shots, when I first started out I was using a uv filter on my kit lens. I have since bought a much better lens, and do not use a filter anymore. The cleaning kit is very handy, I have no problems there but also bought a professional cleaning kit. The mini tripod is quite cute and has been handy a few times, beware, I have had trouble getting it to hold up my camera sturdy enough with anything other than the kit lens. As stated above, the camera and everything it comes with is good. It also comes with a remote shutter which is very nice as well. I tried it out with my silly little tripod and was pleased with the result.

Cons: My biggest issue with my purchase is it sounded like you are getting two extra lenses with the purchase. You're not. The picture you see of the three lenses grouped together: the bigger one is the kit lens and the two extras next to it are them. They are not lenses, they do not attach to the camera. I would call these "lens extensions", as they screw onto your kit lens like a uv filter does. They are also 100% worthless, please take it from someone who has already tried them, and then bought other lenses and compared the difference. I would upload the bad pictures they took, but have since deleted them out of my library. The bag it comes with is incredibly small, and barely fits all of your accessories, heaven forbid you go and get more equipment to add to it. I have since purchased a backpack that I can grow into, and the bag is now a spare parts bag. The bigger tripod is a cheap plastic, and while it is just fine for indoor photography and videos, I wouldn't dare use it on a windy day taking landscape shots. The flash could be a pro or con depending on your personal thoughts. It is not an ETTL, meaning that you have to manually adjust your settings to match the flash and how it fires, the camera will not do it for you. It also is completely stationary, it is brighter than the built-in flash, which is better for outdoor shots that you need to light up. I can imagine it would be difficult for a beginner, it was difficult for me.

Conclusion: If I had known better at the time, I would have either spent less money to get a kit without "lenses" or spent a little bit more to get real lenses included in the kit. The camera itself and the SD cards provide wonderful value, but I would not make this purchase again and wouldn't recommend it to anyone.

reviews.reviewTitle: Super easy to use and very high quality pictures
reviews.reviewText: Will keep this review short and simple. This is my first camera, this bundle has everything you need if you're into photography. This, in my opinion is a great camera to start learning on. Super easy to use and very high quality pictures. I've been out shooting the past few days and have taken some amazing pictures. Worth every penny! If you're thinking about buying it, do it! You won't be disappointed.

This is a great camera. Easy to use and take great pictures. The accessories are useful. However, the flash is not compatible with this camera (see alert). I read that this flash is not compatible with the camera. Therefore, they are sending accessories that are not compatible in a bundle which is not fair. Other than the accessories, this is a great camera.

reviews.reviewTitle: An amazing purchase for a beginner photographer
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for a great entry level camera and kit for photography look no further! They say that a picture can speak a thousand words. I will let the pictures do just that.

I highly recommend this product!
I am no pro when it comes to photography, but I do want my own slr and want to learn! This is perfect for a beginner like me, it came with so much accessories. Love it!

It came in a box, of course! Lol see picture below, everything has its own case. Seriously, everything a beginner would need is here.

We love this camera. I bought it for my wife and after a couple days of learning how to use it she was taking professional quality photos. The camera is easy to use and comes with everything you need to get started. The bundle package is a good deal.

Bought this set for the youth group at the local church. Works great but my only complaint is that the extra flash that comes with this bundle does not work!?!? Why would the seller even sell it with this camera if it does not work?? I saw other reviews stating the same thing but I Figured ok maybe I will be the lucky one that has one that will work, nope. But that will not deter me from using this camera. 4 stars. Good camera with a dollar store extras. Dollar tree at that. If you find this review helpful click the helpful button.

This camera is an excellent choice for a step up from point-and-shoot, or a first camera for a novice DSLR. It's fully automatic but you can gradually take creative control of every aspect of your photography as you become more comfortable with the settings and features. The tiny instruction manual included in the package gives just the basics and can be frustrating, but download the PDF file and there are your clear directions, step by step and in color. For an experienced amateur photographer some of the items included in the kit will be redundant (who doesn't have at least two tripods?) but buying the camera, lenses, flash and cards separately would be more expensive than what you receive in this packed bundle. The only thing I would change is one feature of its WiFi capabilities. Unlike the Canon SX60HS, it can't wirelessly download to the hard drive of a computer. You would use your cable or card reader. But it's just a minor annoyance. It can easily send your photos to any mobile device.

Absolutely love my camera 110%.... The quality is great and not to mention all the accessories it comes with that are very handy. I am really happy with this camera and I am looking to buy another lens just to take more awesome shots.

reviews.reviewTitle: Went from knowing absolutely nothing and taking garbage pictures to taking some breathtaking pictures
reviews.reviewText: Went from knowing absolutely nothing and taking garbage pictures to taking some breathtaking pictures. Once you start to learn all the functions (still learning) you will no doubt be on par with some of the best out there. This camera is beautiful, ergonomic, and fantastically well priced.

I just got this today and can't really say much about the camera except that it's very nice and surprisingly lighter than I had expected (which is good) everything else you get with it is ok. My favorite is the large tripod. The screen protectors do not look good on the screen so I didn't use them (see pic) The flash is by Vivitar so is the camera bag and table top tripod (which was not able to hold the camera) The extra lenses and lens filters provided are by a different company so you need to purchase an adapter to connect them if you want to use them with the camera. I took a few pictures of sunflowers on here to show you the amazing detail. Customer service is wonderful and super to deal with. The cleaning kit came with a soaked box and empty bottle but said they'd send me another one. So far so good, I think it's great! I'll update this review if I need to, in the meantime I'll try to answer anyone's questions if you have any.

reviews.reviewTitle: Reliable camera. Nice picture quality and easy for a novice to use.
reviews.reviewText:
This is the 3rd Canon Rebel I have owned. I had one before the era of digital cameras and then I purchased my first digital version 12 years ago. My 12 year old very outdated Canon Rebel was still taking good pictures but the lag time and some other issues had me looking to finally upgrade to a newer version. After reading reviews, I decided to go with the T6 and the package deal offered here on Amazon.

This camera is everything I expected it to be. An upgraded and better version of my older one. All of my Canon lens and my Canon Flash attachment can be interchanged. I still haven't had a chance to figure out how the Wi-Fi features works but will get to that feature shortly.

I am strictly a novice photographer. I really have no idea how to use any of the manual settings. This camera helps a novice feel more like a
pro. The quality of the pictures is impressive. I highly recommend this camera for anyone that enjoys photography but may feel a bit intimidated by some of the more complex and expensive SLR cameras. This camera is easy enough for anyone to figure out.

I also recommend this package. Although I won't use everything that was included, the memory cards, the UV filters ,and the two screw on lens attachments make it worth purchasing the bundle. As for the UV filter it's good to use just to protect your camera. Sometimes I remove it
before taking a picture and then screw it back on when I am finished. It's a great extra layer of protection.

I am SO excited about this purchase! When i saw the price for how much it came with I was sold. I still can't believe it's mine! My boyfriend got the older version of this camera a few years back and he absolutely loved it. I wanted to get this camera to take pictures of our adventures together and everything along the way! also starting a youtube channel here soon! I will update with more awesome pictures later on. If you're thinking about getting this camera and you have the money, do it!
You need this camera and set, just trust me. Take good photographs with it's HD lens like my friend's $2,000 camera does. He's mad. Lol

reviews.reviewTitle: This DSLR is a great entry level camera
reviews.reviewText: This DSLR is a great entry level camera, me and my wife are using it to learn photography. Works perfectly. I took one star because the external flash of the bundle only works as slave and does not work directly with the camera. (This means that it is still usable, the flash reads the light from the camera flash and works, you just cant use it directly attached to the camera as the main flash) If this is a bundle everything should work properly). Is important to note that not all the things from the bundle are of very good quality but many are really useful. In our case, the most useful items of the bundle are: Tripod, sd cards, bag, cleaning cloth, external shooting cable. I'll upload some photos shoot with the camera with the default kit lens it came with, important to note that I shoot in RAW and use Lightroom, nothing mayor, just a bit of contrast, just a little bit of saturation and sharpness. With good lighting and good composition this camera does the job really well. (We own a Foodtruck business)

reviews.reviewTitle: The added accessories are not from Canon and the quality ...
reviews.reviewText: The added accessories are not from Canon and the quality are so so low. Just buy the camera alone and don't waist your money for low quality accessories.

**Update - The good news is I am NOT completely crazy. The bad news is that this Canon IS (crazy). Simply put, this camera (Rebel T6) provides wifi connection to everything BUT a computer! The options you are given are to transfer to another camera, a mobile device, a printer, or Canon's cloud-based service. Do other Canon cameras allow you to connect to computers via wifi? Yes, but not this one. To me, this IS crazy because without this (basic) feature, you either have to swap out SD cards or connect the camera via USB. Clearly, the technology IS there, they have just disabled it in order to force people to use their cloud service. Not cool, Canon.

**My original Post
You definitely get your money's worth with this package and a friend of mine was delighted to hear that I bought this set, because she was expecting to pay twice as much for less items. I will say that, for some reason, the camera I got has a difficult time focusing on the subject if it is not brightly lit (on auto-focus and with most of the pre-set picture modes). I initially thought that the 2x zoom was the culprit, but after removing that, I still tend to have issues. Granted, the camera is still a bit new to me, but I used to have a 35mm Canon Rebel and I never had the issue I'm having now. I'm sure I'll be able to get it to work more reliably after I get used to it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Camera is great, accessories are mostly junk
reviews.reviewText:
I love the camera, but the accessories are junk. The card reader ruined a couple of cards, so buy a better one. The 55mm lens is great. The other ones aren't very exciting. The camera bag was alright, but don't expect to fit everything in it. The tripod is a cheap-o, but does the trick for beginners. The polarized filter is excellent. I leave it on the camera as a lens protector. The card case is handy for all the SD cards.

I'd recommend this camera in a heartbeat, but most of the non-canon accessories are garbage. It's a great beginner/intermediate camera. The auto and pre-set options aren't worth using, and you'll be disappointed with the pictures those take. I highly recommend taking the time to learn the aperture, shutter, ISO, etc. It's easy to get off of the auto-mode and use AV, TV, P modes. Do that, and you'll be taking near-pro pictures in no-time.

So far everything in the picture is off.. I hope people read this, the bag and most of the products in here are from an extremely crappy brand called vivitar. I went with cannon because cannon is a high quality product. Vivitar is not. Vivitar produces horrible stuff. It is extremely sad to see that I bought this with my income tax, so I can take better pictures of my one year old, and our new baby on the way, and when I open I see vivitar it makes me feel like a bought a Gucci bag on the streets of new York city. I hope they didn't swap the camera insides and just leave a cannon shell. Ugh, if this was in the pictures I would not have bought this.

reviews.reviewTitle: Too much extra stuff that I will never use and not the stuff I needed
reviews.reviewText: Lots of stuff included that I won't use and the one thing I thought I was getting (the higher powered zoom lens) was not included. Then when I go to see if I can purchase it, I can't find it. Lots of fluff and not the right stuff!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great value, Good Package, not all "Canon" equipment
reviews.reviewText:
Based on the fact that this package was $100 less than any other store (including retail and wholesale conventional stores), I was very concerned that there would be some sneaky practice involved such as swapping out the Canon lens that comes in the standard kit and replacing it with a cheaper lens. So far as far as I can tell, there is no such trickery. All of the items are packed in one big box as one item. Mine came in an additional outer amazon box. If that is surely the case there is absolutely no reason to buy this camera anywhere else, especially if you have Prime. I personally ordered it on Tuesday and it arrived on Thursday even though it was only guaranteed by Friday.

As you might suspect everything except the camera kit itself (body, 1 lens, neckstrap, etc.) are not Canon brand. As shown in the picture the memory cards are transcend, and the rest is a blend between a few brands, mostly Vivitar and Xit Photo (the brand for the additional two lenses). I am not as qualified as I would like to be to comment on the quality of the two additional lenses, and so will update this review once I have a true photographer friend check them out.

As for the camera itself, the big disappointment thus far has been the "Wi-fi" capability. We were upgrading from a Rebel T1, and the majority of the functions for this camera are the same and work great. If you bought this you were looking for an entry-level DSLR, and that is exactly what you get. The Wi-Fi function however is fairly horrendous. Yes, TECHNICALLY you can upload photos directly from the camera to a certain set of web services (including google drive which is my choice), but not without first installing software on your PC and/or phone and going through a complicated set up process. Once you have all that set up you quickly find there is no way to simply "upload all" photos from your camera, but you have to select and send them one by one. The only possible exception to this is the Canon service itself which I have no intention of using. I have not tried photos set up for HDR yet, but I am relatively sure it will have a hard time for that as it wasn't even advertised.

Everything else about this camera is great, and the wife loved unpacking all the accessories. So far every item I have tested has worked great (the two memory cards, the memory card reader, the lens cap saver thingy, tripod. So many little things in here she didn't know she needed. I will update this review as I use more items or have relevant information.

reviews.reviewTitle: Product did not arrive in proper working condition
reviews.reviewText: I'm sure the camera quality was fine but my package came in and there were some sort of rice grain stuck inside of the actual camera lens.The camera was also cover in some sort of white flakey stuff that was hard to get out. And the inside lenses were already dirty and smudgy even though I had just took it out of the box. I will be sending everything back and getting a refund. Some thing like is is not acceptable considering how much money this camera cost.

Good Camera for beginners. My only problem is that the lowest aperture the camera can shoot is F4.5 and the highest the lens can shoot is F5.6. So if you want your pictures to look fine af there are only 3 aperture stops you can shoot at (F4.5,F5, and F5.6). If you shoot at an aperture to high for the lens, your pic will look like the Palm trees below. A good pic but the lens couldn't handle the aperture. It would have been great if the lens it came with could shoot at a higher aperture.

reviews.reviewTitle: All of correct accessories came in excellent condition with warranty and instructions
reviews.reviewText: This was one of those purchases that had me refreshing my Amazon app to check tracking every 10 minutes. Although I chose the free shipment method, it arrived in 2 days. All of correct accessories came in excellent condition with warranty and instructions, except for one item which I'm sure I'll figure out eventually. It's a small piece with a handle and adhesive. I purchased this camera for a trip to Europe that I'll be taking in May, but I'm so inspired by the camera, I'll be doing personal photo shoots. The quality is great. I took a selfie and a photo of my turntable that I didn't realize was as dusty as it is until looking at the photo!

reviews.reviewTitle: Camera is great as canon is canon.. products, hmm...
reviews.reviewText:
The camera is of course working and everything was ok, but the bag came broken.. so that was a bit depressing. The part where the strap attaches was torn..
Day 2 and the other side ripped.. and I mean I get the bag isnt the main point of the order but it is really annoying I can't carry my camera out cause I need to get a new bag. If this is a kit, like everything should work pretty fine right?
It was so annoying when it snapped It made me almost drop the camera and the lenses in the bag

Very impressed. Bought this for my daughter who loves to take pictures on her phone. This is a major upgrade. I was concerned when I read some reviews that said the wide angle lens and the filters were not compatible with the camera. We were able to use every accessory and we found everything in this kit to be high quality and compatible if you know how to hook it up. One ding... the auto focus is a little slow, but she prefers the manual setting. Very good value.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great camera, easy to use but needs a power cord.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera to take photos of jewelry I'm going to be selling and for family events. It's pretty easy to use. It comes with a lot of stuff that I probably won't ever need, but they are nice to have anyway. I think it is a good value. The only thing that bothers me is that it depends so much on the battery being charged. There is no power cord to plug into a wall socket so that you can shoot table-top objects without the battery. You have to rely on the battery all the time. It can get tedious remembering "Oh yeah, I need to charge the battery — AGAIN". Down time. I was able to download photos into my Macintosh (which is 8 years old) without the battery being charged. That being said, you can't charge the battery while it's in the camera from the computer. I do like the quality of the photos and even though it comes with the two extra lenses, the one it comes with is very good. Overall, I am happy with this purchase. Just wish it came with a power cord.

Great camera for me. I bought to continue a great photographic journey with my son. This year is first year playing tackle football so I got the camera to take football pics..I ended up purchasing the 75-300mm telephoto lense, better for sports, in addition the the wide angle that came w the camera.

reviews.reviewTitle: Just Get the Camera and lens from an Authorized Dealer.
reviews.reviewText:
Just get a Canon, and Canon lens. The only thing worth having in this kit is the Canon, and the Canon lens. Everything else is garbage.
-The Digital Ultraviolet filter could come in handy if you put them to use.
-The memory card holder is cute, but I could have lived without it.
-The flash isn't compatible with Canon T6, therefore it's possible for it not to be compatible with any Canon(I wouldn't take the risk).
-The extra lenses... You guest it, they are not compatible with Canon lenses.
-SD cards work as they should.
-The tripod is cheap and generic.
-The remote shutter works as it should.
-The bag is standard, and if I'm missing something, no worries, it a huge chance you don't need it.
The only reason I gave it a two instead of one has nothing to do with Vivitar. Save your money, get the basics from authorized dealers, and go from there.

reviews.reviewTitle: It is a great package but a buy a new neck strap if you can
reviews.reviewText:
I’m an amateur photographer. I do senior pictures for fellow students and family portraits. The quality is amazing it’s easy enough to use point click and the flash works fantastic. The extra light I’ve set up as an exterior light for some photo projects and it’s worked fantastically. The tripod works in any ground pretty much with the help of a small level on the top of it. If I’m on a hill and I wanna know if it’s straight it works perfectly. The lenses are great! Perfect condition when the arrived, they are exactly what I wanted and what a steal! The UV lens is perfect for super gloomy days I think. It makes them look a little brighter in my opinion less bleh. Which is always nice. The bag it comes with is sturdy no tears no holes! The dividers are movable. You can take them out and switch them around! Which is nice since I’m always switching out the stuff I need for work! It has a million pockets to fit everything you need! The lenses have small pouches and covers to put on and in when you’re not using them. Handy indeed! The two SD cards work great! It has a little wallet like case for them that can attach to the cameras strap for easy convenient use! It does not has an extra battery for the camera however! It charges super fast in an hour and a half (1hr 30 mins) usually it’ll be fully charged! It’s also WiFi enabled! Meaning if you ya ether cannon app you can use your camera remotely through the app! You can also download pictures from it and tag locations you’ve shot at! Super handy!!!! The small clicker you can hook up on the side of camera is great! It works great! It’s very short however. Use only when working with nervous kids so they don’t see you take the picture! The pocket tripod isn’t that useful for me personally but maybe a smaller vlogger or general YouTuber could find it useful it’s only about 5 inches high but it’s super sturdy! The camera might look to big but it holds up great! I use the strap it’s semi comfortable it needs broken in but I don’t recommend it. It’s rough around the edges of it but still usable. I’m ordering a better strap because I use it often and my neck will hurt after shooting for 4-5 hours.
Overall great package! Super useful and great for amateurs or people starting out with Cannon!

reviews.reviewTitle: A good deal, great camera for amateurs
reviews.reviewText:
I had been using a 10 year old hand-me-down Canon Rebel until it died. I knew I wanted another Rebel, so I chose this bundle as the best deal acknowledging that some of the accessories are off-brand and possibly useless. I had checked a couple stores, and I would have paid the same amount, if not more, for just the camera and the lens. The one down side is that it doesn't offer an extended warranty, so I'll just have to keep my fingers crossed. The camera is great, the lens is ok. I have a better lens from my old camera, so I didn't use the stock lens much. As for the accessories- the memory card, external flash, usb reader, and remote all function with the camera. Everything fits in the bag that comes with it, except for the tripod. I think this is a good bundle for the money.

I think the Canon Rebels are a great option for people who aren't trying to make money off their photography. I've never used another type of camera, so I can't fully compare but I've been able to take photos I'm really proud of with both of my rebels, and a free online photog course.

Love this camera. I'm a beginner looking for a cheap entry level camera so it was between the Nikon d3400 or T6 and I think I made the right choice. Only had it for a couple days but loving my results.

reviews.reviewTitle: Horrible package and complete waste of money
reviews.reviewText: The purchase was extremely poorly packaged with little cushion and protection. No surprise that there were broken parts. Also the boxes and items seemed to have been opened and even previously used. When trying to return it, post office refused to ship because of inclusion of lithium battery. DHL can ship it but at a cost of more than USD250! Now I am at a loss on what to do with the broken item I cannot use but already paid for.

I've wanted a Canon EOS Rebel for years so finally splurged to buy one and glad I did. I took the attached pic of the full moon the other night with the optional 300mm lens I purchased and it works great!

reviews.reviewTitle: Very pleased!! My son needed a camera for a ...
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased!! My son needed a camera for a beginner photography class and this is perfect. Very easy to use and he loves that he can share directly from the camera to his iPhone. :) Also- the bundle came with all sorts of goodies. Great deal!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing camera with an amazing kit for people just like ...
reviews.reviewText: Amazing camera with an amazing kit for people just like me- beginners who really want to learn! Everything is included and genuine as described!

I think the camera and the primary lens is what was described. HOWEVER, the others items listed as "lens" ARE NOT LENSES - they are adaptors. What is described as lenses screw to the front of the lenses attached to the camera. They do not attach directly to the camera. This is a complete MISREPRESENTATION of what is being sold as lenses. BUYER BEWARE!

Hate the stock lens. Look around and hunt down a better telephoto or a wide angle lens. It does come with stock versions however they just suck... They suck better than my vacuum... It's almost impossible to get a great shot of the moon even under the best lighting conditions. Other than that the other gimmes were okay, but really aren't necessary. You'll find out once you start to actually use the kit. IMO look into getting a colored lens kit for around 10-20 bucks. This will help with some of your nature shots and cut down on using Photoshop or other like programs for editing. Also, make sure to register this. I found out that the software for your model will be sent via a link that way you know what you need.

reviews.reviewTitle: Seems like a pretty good kit for a beginner so far
reviews.reviewText: Seems like a pretty good kit for a beginner so far, I'm just starting out, so I'll find out. Most of the kit items are of low quality, but the it's a great setup for a beginner on a budget. The wide angle lens I received however does not fit the anything that came with the kit (including it's own cap). I'm pretty sure some of this was used, but I mostly got it for the camera and lens. I'm frustrated the lens isn't usable right now, but all in all, if you have no supplies, I guess it's a start. I may have gone with another kit though if I knew the lens wasn't going to work. To clarify, the telephoto lens works fine, the macro wide angle lens does not. (And if there's a piece I need to make it fit, it doesn't come with the kit, so still useless right now.)

I've been watching this camera and package for years now and I finally bought it. I love it! It was everything I wanted and more. This is my first DSLR so I figured from other reviews, I would get familiar with the camera and technic and slowly upgrade lens, etc... the price is the same for the camera alone so why not add all the extra for free pretty much. The bag is perfect size to carry everything. The camera is VERY user friendly. I went on Pinterest to find tips and tricks for this camera and became overwhelmed with all the options. But just playing with it for a few hours, I feel like a pro already :) no Pinterest involved lol. I use the telephoto lens the most!

reviews.reviewTitle: AHHH I finally have a nice camera!
reviews.reviewText: The original estimate for me receiving my camera was September 13th however I received the camera 2 days after I ordered it. The camera itself is great! I love all the accessories and I think it actually comes with a few more things than pictured. I'm an amateur when it comes to photography so I didn't really know what I was doing when I first opened the camera set up but it's pretty self explanatory once you read the manual to find out what everything does. The lenses are great! I haven't messed around with the filters yet but they're looking clean and clear. I'm super glad I bought this camera with all the accessories. I've priced cameras for over a year and I'm glad I finally got one. Great price for everything you get!!

I was excited to order this because I read so many great reviews about the video quality from this camera. But it really was not worth the money I spent on it. The camera on my smartphone is far superior to this. Maybe I'll just use it for photographs.

LOVE my camera! It was a dream come true to buy it. It's the best camera I've ever gotten. However not sure how the warranty works, so I feel I wasted money on that part. However the camera itself is amazing! Plus all the accessories that comes with it is awesome and very helpful!

The camera is wonderful. Appropriate for a beginner and takes great pictures. A lot of the equipment included in this kit is quite useful, and some I haven't touched yet. I did try out the telephoto lens extender and found it difficult to thread properly. It pulled apart when I removed it from the kit lens and I wasn't quite sure what lens parts belonged with the kit lens and which ones belonged with the extender. But I eventually figured it out. So, I'd just say be careful with the extenders. Thread them slowly and delicately or they come apart. The tripod has a removable clip that you can leave on your camera to easily clip back onto the tripod. Very convenient. Overall, I'm pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: I love this camera so much
reviews.reviewText: I love this camera so much!!! I'm still learning how to use it but i'm mostly glad that this deal is 100% real and not a scam! I read everything this camera came with and still couldn't believe how much stuff it came with until it arrived!! Highly suggest this package if this is the camera you're looking for!!!!

I got this wonderful amazing camera for my birthday and absolutely love it! This is my first time getting a dslr or a canon and I love it! I think it’s and amazing beginner camera there’s not much to say but this camera is amazing! Also all the item you get I haven’t played with all of them but you get a lot and they all seem really helpful.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wasn't what I was looking for.
reviews.reviewText: I love that the camera came with a lot of beginner essentials - but a lot of the equipment seems very cheap. I took the camera on vacation with me about a month ago and did not use it as much as I thought I would because of the many different lens. Overall you probably get what you pay for cheap=cheap camera. My iphone sadly takes better pictures. The auto focus is terrible.

I usually use my cell phone to take pictures of my family, not always the best quality of pics are produced with cell phones. This is my first real professional style camera. My Forever purchased this for me and I am IN LOVE with this camera(Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera). I am truly happy with the package set (multiple lenses, 2 tripods, multiple memory cards, and more.) This is a great camera at a reasonable price.

Candy

The camera itself is amazing. We loved it as soon as we unpackaged it. It's easy to use and there are so many various YouTube videos on the manual guide, tips and tricks, etc. The additional flash that comes in this package is not compatible with the camera, unfortunately. The additional lenses seemed to work well, but we could tell only a slight difference with the filtered lenses on a bright but cloudy day (diffused light). I would recommend this camera package to anyone who is starting out in photography, or anyone who wants a nice camera for family photos at events, soccer games, etc. A great find!

This is the first DSLR I’ve used, so I only have past point and shoots and my phone to compare it to- I’m very impressed! My TA helped me pick out this model/set to start with as I needed a DSLR for my photo class and I was lost as to what to get. I’ve been using this camera and the various inclusions for the past couple of weeks, and it has really aided in improving my photos. There are quite a few things I haven’t used yet (like the filters) but the SD cards, reader, tripods, and bag have all been helpful. In fact, I found the included “Photo4Less” bag to be a little too big for my daily use. It will definitely hold a lot of extra accessories inside of it alongside the camera and kit lens. However, for my purposes, I went ahead and purchased another smaller bag for walking around town/campus with. The included bag would probably be good for traveling though.

I found the seller of this bundle, Photo4Less, to be good. I received all my items on my estimated arrival date (fast shipping with prime) and nothing was damaged or not working properly. Overall, if you’re a beginner like me, I think this is a good camera bundle to start with.

Even though I absolutely love my camera, I haven't needed to use the portable flash component until now. I inserted new AA batteries and the flash does not work which is upsetting. During the summer I didn't need the extra flash as majority of my photos are outside during daylight but as we're going into fall and winter I decided to test it...and doesn't work. Which is quite upsetting as I will now need to purchase an extra component. :(. I bought this set off the recommendation of a friend who bought it and loves it and all his accessories work.

Other than this I definitely recommend this camera as it's extremely user friendly!

reviews.reviewTitle: Remember this is a budget camera.
reviews.reviewText:
Okay, for the cost this is probably a 4 star item.

However, I give this a 3 stars because it fell below my expectations.

My expectations were a little high, as the image quality is not what I would have imagined. I feel like my samsung s9 gets nearly the same camera quality.

However, I've been told if I upgrade the lenses, the quality would be much better.

GREAT camera! I'm a beginner....I've only used point and clicks before....I was taking pics inside of five mins. The full auto setting is my friend! I couldn't figure out the macro/wide angle lens, though....until I noticed that that was TWO lenses screwed together. lol Works perfectly now! Only detraction; the little screen/lens cleaner, Vivitar product, the bottle cap was cracked and the liquid contents leaked out inside its little box. It's like a tablespoon of liquid inside its own little box so it's not like it's a biggy. GREAT camera kit!!! Highly recommend this one, guys!

This camera is fabulous. I bought this for my husband who had never used a camera other than on his smartphone. The camera is very easy to use and he quickly learned how to shoot pictures and take video. The photos come out incredibly clear and very professional looking. The accessories that come with the package are somewhat cheap, the tripod broke after a few uses. But for the memory cards and Canon brand items inside the price is totally worth it!

reviews.reviewTitle: The picture quality is amazing. It's very user friendly
reviews.reviewText: This is the first higher quality camera I purchased. I've owned it for a few months now and can't complain. The picture quality is amazing. It's very user friendly. You are able to connect it right to your phone and instantly transfer your photos to your phone for very easy uploading. The battery life is good. I haven't used the video recording feature yet so I can't comment but the bundle is a fantastic deal for anybody looking for a great camera without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewTitle: This camera is a longtime dream!
reviews.reviewText: I previously owned a Canon Rebel film 35mm camera bought it back in 2000...loved it!! Had wanted a new digital camera for a long time, found this kit deal and couldn't pass it up for the price!!! You get so many accessories and items to assist you in great photography. I would highly recommend this to anyone thinking of purchasing a digital 35mm.

I have never had experience with cameras past my smart phones. I have been wanting a "real legit" camera for a while now. I finally decided to purchase it. So far, it's amazing. It came with so much more than I originally thought. There was debate on what actually came with it so I was not expecting much. The amount I paid was definitely worth it. Everything came in great condition. It took me a second to sit down and put everything together but it wasn't too hard to figure out. I recommend this to others who are in a similar situation. The quality of the pictures are great too as you can see from other people's reviews. And yes, half the stuff I took pictures of are on my leg.. fight me.

Everything is lovely! (Haven't taken more than a few test pics so, know that when reading)

Firstly, shipping time was IMMACULATE. nuff said.

Second, SO MANY ACCESSORIES! If you're trying to get into photography or do it as a hobby n need a quick upgrade, THIS IS IT. It is the camera set itself (camera base, battery charger, is chord, and lens) and an additional 14 (I think I counted right?) Accessories: 4 filters (2 uv's, cpl, fld), 2 lenses (wide angle w macro, & telephoto), flash attatchment, mini tripod, 60" tripod, 16 & 32 gb sd cards, lens cleaner, a remote shutter trigger, and a gadget bag. W H E W a lot. Do know that the only thing that's Canon brand is the camera set; the accessories I received are vivtar (and transcend sd cards).

I think the only BIG con is that IT DOES NOT COME W BATTERIES. you have to buy em separate. But man if they add that in later, y'all I'm saying there's no real reason not to get this.

Can't wait to take photos n better my hobby!!

Loved my camera so much!!!! Had it for a year and everything worked amazingly. So recommend to everyone!! Unfortunately my camera was stolen. Was going to the hospital to deliver my baby and in the rush of things left my camera bag in the car and forget to lock my car door.....I was hoping the company can replace ( i know it was a long shot) but it was worth the try. Sadly they didnt but I dont blame them. It took beautiful pictures though. And was so easy to use.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not impressed with photo quality; also zipper on camera bag was defective
reviews.reviewText: I took my first photos this evening with the Rebel camera using the automatic features, and took pics with my Samsung Galaxy S7, too, of the same subject. I think my phone took better pictures--clearer and better color. Perhaps as I become more proficient with the camera the photos will improve, but so far I'm not impressed. Also, the front zipper on the Vivitar camera bag was defective, however Amazon customer service was very helpful and is sending a replacement bag free.

This camera is great for beginner to intermediate DSLR photographers and is very user friendly. Arrived on time and came with everything description listed. All accessories work with the camera and are easily attached. Definitely worth the money.

reviews.reviewTitle: Stop Looking and Get One of These
reviews.reviewText: Excellent addition to anyone's photographic arsenal. Images are rich, sharp and colors are vivid. Manual mode is simple and bracketing feature available for those wanting to get into HDR. I'd recommend this camera to anyone looking for a great SLR, can never go wrong with a Canon.

This kit is subpar. In hindsight, I would have just bought the camera body and got the 50mm and 10-18mm lenses separately instead of getting the whole kit. The 18-55mm lense is for beginners. I used it for a short while until I got two new lenses (50mm and 10-18mm). The lense attachments for the include 18-55mm lense simulate what true wide-angle and telephoto lenses can do. The flash is OKAY. I'd recommend an external flash from Pro Master with an IR remote. It's nice that the kit include two memory cards. I shoot in RAW so the more space, the better. The tripod is decent, but the screw plate isn't a very stable platform for the camera. It also does not feature a quick-attach, so you will have to meticulously screw on the camera every time you want to use the tripod. The bag is okay but a little bulky. I got the Think Tank Turnstyle 10 after a few months of using the Vivitar bag. Overall, this is a good buy for beginners, but in the long run, I'd recommend investing in better gear over time, if you're going to be a serious photographer.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great camera, WIFI only lets you view on your smartphone
reviews.reviewText: Great camera, but the wifi feature is really misleading. It only allows you to view on your smartphone. If you want to upload to your computer or a web service, you have to connect it to a computer via USB. In other words Wifi is worthless. Pictures seem pretty nice, but my first DSLR, easy to use, good UI and menus explain what you are doing.

reviews.reviewTitle: The Canon Stuff is good, but most of the other stuff is unnecessary junk
reviews.reviewText: The camera and lens it comes with is amazing. All the other gear with it is crap. What I don't like about legitimate DSLRs is their lack of flexibility. I've been able to take a bigger verity of shots with a point and shoot than with this. The lens here is made for close range and indoor shooting only and it does it VERY well, but that is it. Guess I have to start a collection of Canon lenses now after I sell a bunch of the add-on junk that came with the kit.

$300 for the camera & a whole bunch of inclusions - everyone I know has been asking me where I got such a great deal! Will be posting some photos taken using this camera & doing an update on durability in the future. For now, I absolutely love it!

reviews.reviewTitle: I've had my camera for a couple months now and I love it. The package comes with so many accessories
reviews.reviewText: What a deal! I've had my camera for a couple months now and I love it. The package comes with so many accessories, this is great for amateur photographers or families wanting something to capture moments beyond a smartphone. The only issue I had was with delivery, it was left in the middle of my porch in the rain. Thankfully I got home before it got too wet and nothing was damaged.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not what I hoped to get
reviews.reviewText: Detachable flash is not compatible, the camera does ok pictures, none of the features like portrait or landscape make any difference in the picture, all are not very sharp, and the flash comes up for every picture unless in the no-flash mode, even in bright light outside. Not happy with it at all but by the time we started using it more it could not be returned.

reviews.reviewTitle: I love this camera, the accessories are meh
reviews.reviewText:
I am new to photography, so I had been doing a decent amount of research, reading reviews, comparing prices...the whole nine yards, before I landed on this Canon Rebel T6 DSLR camera bundle.I feel like I should start first with saying I absolutely love this camera. While I've only had a couple of cheaper cameras that I could call my own, I have used a variety of cameras, but this is my first DSLR....and I LOVE IT! The Canon lens that comes with it is a handy for multiple situations and shooting conditions, as well as the ability to zoom a bit. However, my praises on this bundle, for the most part, start and end with the camera and the Canon lens. Most of the bundle is kind of a joke except for a few choice items, that I should say does still make it worth the additional $20 or so more it is than getting just the camera and lens without the accessories. The bag, SD cards, and SD card reader are all helpful, and are by themselves worth the extra $20 for the included accessory bundle. However, the stand alone flash is not compatible with this camera. The two "lenses" that are included are not really lenses at all, but actually screw on the end of your nice Canon lenses, making your pictures worse. The cheap filters are exactly that, a handful of cheap filters, that I suppose could come in handy, maybe, one day...possibly. I have not tried out the remote switch yet or the lens cleaning kit. And lastly, the tripod is a cheap plastic one that will likely get broken in a matter of a few shows during transport, and will likely need to be replaced. Attached some photos from the camera.
Tl;dr - This bundle is great, and this camera is amazing for someone who wants solid quality for a good price. The accessories that come with it are worth the extra $20.

reviews.reviewTitle: ... really wanted the T6i but this was such an amazing deal and it surpassed my expectations with all that ...
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted the T6i but this was such an amazing deal and it surpassed my expectations with all that came with the camera for the price. My photos are amazing with this camera. It is perfect for my needs right now.

reviews.reviewTitle: I ordered this camera kit and was more than happy with the package when it arrived
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this camera kit and was more than happy with the package when it arrived. It is an excellent value and I'm planning on getting a lot of use from it. The box arrived when it was supposed to and was in great condition. Very pleased with this order.

reviews.reviewTitle: get so much for the price
reviews.reviewText: if you're looking for a step up beginner SLR camera, this is it. And it comes with everything pictured. Tripod, different size lenses, memory cards, filters, such a great deal for this price point. I wanted a beginner camera to use to work on my photography skills and this camera is lightweight, easy to use and takes really good quality photos. highly recommend for beginners and non beginners alike!

Overall the camer is awesome! I've gotten excellent photos and have found the camera easy to navigate. The accessories are okay, but they are all third party. My wide angle lens came broken upon receiving the package. The other lenses easily come apart, which makes me hesitant to use them. Everything else came in tact. I've found it difficult to contact the original seller about the issue. I certainly will not buy any third party accessories ever again for such an expensive purchase.

This was a Christmas gift for my wife and she loves it. All of the advertised add-ons were in the box. Everything was in it's own package inside the main shipping box. Everything in the box was new, as advertised, and works great. All of the accessories that came in the kit, the Canon EOS T6 camera. The only items my wife has not used is the mini stand and the slave light. She has attached the items to ensure they fit the camera, they do, but has not had to use them as of yet. Overall a great starter DSLR camera.

I am very disappointed with this camera. I believe it has a defect in it though. No matter what settings I use or what I've done, my pictures are consistently grainy and out of focus. This is not good as I am a seasoned photographer. I used a T3i for many years without an issue so I do feel I have a defective camera.
I will never buy from this particular company again.
Came exactly as described. I'm an entry level photographer and this was exactly everything I was looking for to get started!

I got this camera to take pictures for my instagram. It’s super easy to use. I still haven’t learned how to take great photos in manual mode yet, but auto mode works great. The WiFi feature is awesome I get the photos on my phone with in minutes. I’ve used the camera a lot of times and I still haven’t had to charge the battery.

reviews.reviewTitle: The camera is awesome but the rest of the stuff that comes with ...
reviews.reviewText: The camera is awesome but the rest of the stuff that comes with it seems rather cheap. For example, the carrying bag's strap broke THE FIRST TIME I USED IT. It was hanging on by a string, thank goodness, otherwise my new camera would have fallen to the ground.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great price for the amount of stuff you get
reviews.reviewText: Great price for the amount of stuff you get. The camera is fantastic. I am not a professional by any means and this camera makes it easy to take pictures that look pretty darn close to being professional.

I am a beginner and use this for personal purposes and this set was perfect. It had everything I needed to get started. The picture quality is amazing and the pre set functions help a ton. Uploading pictures has always been quick and easy. Battery life is way beyond what I ever expected. Great purchase!

It's my first professional camera. I'm still learning to take pictures with this camera. I think it's a little tricky to use because the camera has many functions, but as time goes on, I'm learning how to use the various types of lenses and camera functions. The product came complete as it is in the ad. I recommend. If the person can take a course to learn how to use the camera is better.

Just got this and I’m so excited to begin using it. This price for all of the lenses and accessories that come with this camera is fantastic esp considering that currently this bundle is only $10 more than the camera and only two lenses.
Love the camera had a week long process learning how to use it but love how it takes pictures! Amazing camera. Would defiantly recommend. 5 stars threes are pictures I took with it

Good camera... But the extra's suck.
... the extra flash doesn't work because the camera has a flash.
... The tripod broke the first time it was used.
... Sun filters are worthless.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great buy. Takes great pictures and all accessories are exact
reviews.reviewText: I was a little skeptical about getting the camera off amazon, especially since it was so low in price with all the added parts. But this was a great birthday gift to myself, I took pictures for my brothers wedding and they came out perfect. All the added things were a bonus

I have had this camera for about a year and after 3 months of using it, the camera/lens started making my photos bend. I know longer have straight lines when taking photos. No one seems to be able to solve the problem. Don't bother getting it in a kit, there is no use for all the extra crap they throw in there. Go for a Nikon!

reviews.reviewTitle: The 8 pictures that I was able to take are nice though!
reviews.reviewText: Alot of the products that were included were pointless. I also had a error message on the screen continuously that wouldn't come off and STILL wont... The 8 pictures that I was able to take are nice though!

Can we rate this a 10 star instead of 5? I surprised our middle daughter for her birthday and she went crazy. Will need a lot of time to review all the information and gadgets in the box but the quality is unbelievable. Such a great product with a bundled kit that we might even buy one for us since we'll probably never see hers! She's always out shooting more photos with it!
Like the camera, extra lenses and other things that came with it. You get so many things with it that would cost much more in department stores.

reviews.reviewTitle: So many items to choose from
reviews.reviewText: Our 14 year old granddaughter loves the whole package of camera equipment and it will come in handy for the photography classes she’s taking in high school. She has been taking photos and loves how easy it is to upload into her iPad and computer.

This is perfect for a first camera, trust me when I say this, it works so easily, battery lasts long, great pictures, like amazing professional quality, I've been hired for many photography jobs because of the camera's quality and ability. I've owned it for a year so far, never broken, very sturdy, love everything about it!!

reviews.reviewTitle: This camera is great! It takes super high quality photos
reviews.reviewText: This camera is great! It takes super high quality photos, is easy to use (you can make it as easy or as hard as you want based on which mode you're in). Plus all of the stuff it came with was awesome! This was my first camera so having a nice starter pack was super helpful! Highly recommend this camera!

reviews.reviewTitle: Accessories are bkt cannon brand like picture and descriptions lead you to believe
reviews.reviewText: Accessories are NOT cannon brand like picture and descriptions lead you to believe. The camera itself is great but save your money and just buy the camera and spend a little extra buying real cannon lenses becase the ones that came with bundle are junk.

I actually purchased this because I needed a DSLR camera for a digital photography course that is required for my design major. I had little knowledge of photography or digital cameras before buying. This is definitely a great camera for beginners cause it comes with literally everything you might need to start out right. I probably read the directions for a good five minutes and found out it was better to play around with some of the semi-auto settings on my own and even went full on into manual mode to snap some shots. I'd say with all the stuff you get in this package it's a great value for the amount you spend.

It is a great Camera, Takes amazing photos but it freezes and then struggles to capture a picture if you use it to often. I am a growing photographer and it seems endless with this problem. I have had the camera since march. And it conitnue to become sluggish and freezes more frequently. I take amazing care of the Camera.

reviews.reviewTitle: so I took a good friend with me to Best Buy to look for ...
reviews.reviewText: I’m NEW to cameras..so I took a good friend with me to Best Buy to look for a camera I could get great pictures with and start off with something nice! She does this for a living so her Advice was super important! Anyways Best Buy has this same camera (just the camera) for a hundred dollars more with nothing else with it! So this bundle deal is the BEST! For right now all I can say is I’m having fun with this camera and so happy I finally purchased this! Couldn’t be happier with it!!

This camera is more than I could have thought to ask for! Its my first camera that isn't a simple pocket sized camera. I was nervous about using it, but it has been a breeze to learn. All the accessories make it a perfect option for starting out. Bonus, my kids are learning with me!

This has been the best purchase I've ever made on Amazon. The price point for everything you receive is the best deal around. Everything arrived timely, together and nothing was missing or dented/damaged. The camera is fantastic. It's very user friendly and the extra features are great. If you're interested in photography but don't know where to start, start with this camera!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Product for beginners and Pros
reviews.reviewText: I like taking photographs. I've never taken a how to but with this camera and some help from youtube I think I'm taking some cool pictures. Maybe not :) It seems to be easy to work with and the settings are opk for me. Now time to gain a collection of lenses for different ratios etc....

reviews.reviewTitle: I've captured a few great up-close photos of birds in the backyard
reviews.reviewText: Just now learning how to use this neat camera, the flash, and other functions. I've captured a few great up-close photos of birds in the backyard, also some indoor people photos. It's simple to learn the basic functions and easy to operate.

reviews.reviewTitle: AWESOME camera for the price!!! Quality of pictures are awesome!!
reviews.reviewText: Such a good package deal. You aren't getting a professional photographer's lens but this lens is SO GOOD! I've used it for food photos, my kids baseball/soccer games and the action shots are clear and excellent. I already had two shots enlarged and the pixels are beautiful. I'm so happy with this purchase. Highly, highly recommend buying this camera.

I have been a Canon camera person for over 30 years and I will remain one for many years to come, This Canon Rebel takes amazing pictures and if you know how to use the features as I do it is also great for videos and sporting events. I am brand loyal because I have never been let down using my Canon products, I have only always just upgraded.

reviews.reviewTitle: I bought this camera so I would have a good camera instead of always using my iPhone to take ...
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this camera for about a week now. I bought this camera so I would have a good camera instead of always using my iPhone to take pics. This camera takes excellent pictures. This is a good camera for beginners because it’s not complicated. This is also a good deal for the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Is easy to use in the automatic modes and can be ...
reviews.reviewText: Has every thing needed to start taking photos. Is easy to use in the automatic modes and can be used in manual mode too. This is a camera that will let you grow into photography while permitting you to take quality photos immediately.

My mom bought me this bundle for as a birthday gift. Unexpected. I was so surprised and happy! It came with so many accessories. The camera is beautiful and takes amazing pictures. The camera bag is really spacious as all of the accessories fit in the bag. The 5ft tripod is sturdy and very portable as it is adjustable. It is the perfect starter kit for anyone.

reviews.reviewTitle: Everything came new and in good condition! She loves it
reviews.reviewText: My daughter bought it with her birthday money. Everything came new and in good condition! She loves it! It is an awesome buy!

I have really enjoyed my new camera and the nice kit that came along with it. I was like a kid in the candy store opening my new present to myself. This camera is great for someone just starting into the real photography world. It is really easy to handle and to is a good solid product.
I gave this to my daughter for a gift and she loves it. It was everything she was looking for in a camera to make YouTube videos and great photos.

reviews.reviewTitle: This was a great deal. Now I have a camera to use ...
reviews.reviewText: Needed a camera for my photography class. This was a great deal. Now I have a camera to use for class and outside of class. Stand it comes with is very cheap. I recommend, if you are a serious photographer, to get another one. The cheap plastic broke pretty fast.

reviews.reviewTitle: Either the battery won’t hold a charge or the charger won’t charge the battery.
reviews.reviewText:
I got charged a 100dollar re stocking fee ! When I return this camera. The battery stop charging after two months of use.

I love the camera. But I just got this in December. I have only used the camera a handful of times and the battery won’t hold a charge. And the charger won’t charge the battery. I had to buy another charger. Because the charger that comes in this bundle doesn’t work. I charged it all night. And when I went to try it out it kept saying the battery was low and to charge it soon.
i’m a beginner and it’s very easy to use and learn with!

I love this camera!! I’m a total newbie with a baby on the way and wanted a great quality camera for all the baby pics coming. I did have to watch a few YouTube tutorials and do some reading to learn this camera but really worth it. Takes great quality photos and is easy to use.

We're very pleased with this purchase. It was a first DSLR Camera for my son who was taking a digital photography class. The camera takes great photos. It has many options and features. We love that it was a no brainer and came with all the accessories that you need. We highly recommend this camera!

Have used this a couple times since buying it. Really only used the 18-55 lens. Have not used all the other items that came with the bundle yet. Overall I would say this is a great first time camera for someone getting into photography. I bought a 18-135 lens on as a separate and used that on July 4.

The perfect camera for beginners. The camera priced alone is about $400, so, the extra $40 for lenses, filters and tripods is well worth the cost. I can upgrade as i go. As the reviews state, the lenses are Canon compatible, but work well. Perfect for learning and growing as a photographer.

I LOVE this camera! I bought it to take family photos. These were the first few pictures taken while I was tinkering around with it. I have 0 experience with photography but this is so easy to use, a child could take stunning photos. In fact, the pictures of the little blonde kitty were taken by my boyfriend's daughter's (ages 10 and 8). I love this camera!

Buying this camera was the best decision I made! I have been looking for a good deal on a nice camera for a while and happened upon this gem.The camera not only is amazing in quality, it also came along with a lot of extras that I didn't even know I would need. This is an amazing deal. To anyone just starting out in photography or doing this for fun, don't pass up on this offer. Everything that it came with works, the shipping was fast and nothing was damaged when it arrived. Hope this review helps as I am also one to religiously look through every comment on a product before purchasing.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great camera, but had to send back for warranty repair within 1 month.
reviews.reviewText:
Good price. Camera takes great pictures, but the screen quit working on our first trip. We were still able to take pics.

Canon's warranty registration is much more complicated than it needs to be, but they repaired and returned the camera quickly.

reviews.reviewTitle: so far it takes great photos!
reviews.reviewText: For a beginning photographer Im having difficulty figuring out how to work this thing, i.e., and especially where the cross arrows are. Other than than, so far it takes great photos!

reviews.reviewTitle: pack is not what you think

1st thing I noticed is the impossible to use viewfinder. Why they even bother putting it on there is beyond me.
Other than that, this thing takes really good photos and really good video.
The on screen controls are really easy and intuitive to use unless you're an idiot.
The lens filters and image effects are completely unnecessary in today's world with Photoshop and After Effects.
So again, why bother including it?

A great camera, learning all what it does is a little tedious, but the pictures are worth it
using it in bright sun makes the viewing screen impossible to see. That's the only bummer about it so far. It's good for a beginner, tho.

reviews.reviewText:
The camera itself it great and I'd give it five stars! Exactly what you'd expect from Canon. However I rated this "bundle" just one star, so I split the difference for my rating.

I feel duped by the accessorie bundle now that I've taken a few classes and am learning what I really need and what is worthless. Some of the accessories aren't even compatible with the camera!! And some articles I've read say their "filter lenses" might even damage your device.

That said you do get two memory cards, a tripod, a strap, and a table tripod that are useful... After some price comparison I don't feel too cheated. Overall I don't like the false advertising here and wish I'd done more research before I bought this bundle.

In bright light if you are close to your subject, the camera takes very nice detailed photos - I was very happy with those and will miss having the ability to take them now that I don't have the camera anymore. Indoors in low light settings was generally a challenge and the automatic settings blurred most of the indoor photos I tried to take. Perhaps someone with more experience could have gotten better photos in low light, I'm not sure.

The camera is 5 stars quality but the bundle makes it 2 stars. Using cell phones to take picture's really had me thinking I was a bit of a natural and worse, a professional photographer. However, I've had expensive camera's before by Kodak and Nikon and they were easy to use when I brought them. I LOVE taking photo's and scrap booking family so, I thought I should buy a good camera to make my photo's look better. I also brought the T6 because of the name "rebel." Silly idea. I opened the camera and I thought I could just cut it on and you have to charge a battery and then add a battery AND the like memory card. And its not like you can just take a picture and then edit the exposure, brightness and so on. You have to like master the settings and read the manual before you can do anything. My brother had a friend come over with his T6I and he helped me with the settings so I could take basic photo's. He told me to keep my setting in 'program' and he set me up in the 'raw' format. The reviews said the lens and flash are not compatible with the T6 so, I have a lot of things I can't use until I take a class or buy a book for Dummies. I mostly take photo's of people but, I brought the bundle to use the lens to take picture's of nature, the sun, tree's and flowers or sky scrapers so the lens are a disappointment. The camera itself is so amazing, I look forward to spending money on quality lens. The camera itself is 5 stars. I am a beginner and I see the different in quality. As a beginner, right now, I use app's to edit my photo's, not the camera. But, I love the way people seem to 'pop' out in photo's and how natural light looks with this camera.
The order came really faster and I expected it much later. The package was set up perfectly and maybe its not the camera and its me. Cells phones have me all messed up but, I learned how to edit pictures with cell phone app's so maybe it will help me later

reviews.reviewTitle: but Looks like it will work for my needs
reviews.reviewText: Still learning the camera, but Looks like it will work for my needs.
Photo4less was very helpful geting the camera to me in time. The camera itself is great and a great kit to start off with.

I bought this camera right before going on a long road trip across the country, and everything I needed to get started as a photographer was included in the kit. The camera and the filters are amazing, and they pick up so much color and detail in the photos. The built in wifi capability from the camera is a lifesaver, allowing you to load photos and videos from your camera onto your phone in one step, even if you don't have cell phone service. The circular polarizer included in the kit works like a dream! The 2 sd cards that come in the bundle are so convince to have, especially on a long trip, because I used almost all the space on both of them. The camera itself can shoot in raw mode as well as jpeg, and it can shoot videos. The camera also hasn't an AEB capability that can be set up to 3 stops for taking hdr photos. The camera battery life seems pretty long while taking photos, but while taking videos it drains pretty fast, which is understandable. The camera bag feels sturdy and durable and can fit all the accessories included in this bundle (except for the tripod) inside the bag with the correct packing. The tripod itself feels a little flimsy compared to other tripods I've used but from my experiences it can support the camera just fine. All in all, if you are looking to buy your first camera, or to upgrade from a previous model, I would reccomend going with this camera bundle. Everything you need to start shootings great photos is included! I have attatched some of my favorite photos I have taken with my canon rebel t6!
I'd give it more stars but I haven't fully learned how to use it yet!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for Beginners or Hobby Photographers
reviews.reviewText:
The Canon t6 is a very nice, durable camera. The small body is rather light, and feels nice to hold, even with my large hands. The ISO goes up to 6400, which is a bit limiting with the kit lens, but I find that it forces me to be creative. I love the WI-FI connectivity, with it I can easily move my photos to my phone via the Canon app. I do feel that this way does take a long time, however. (If I move 150 RAW photos, it would take about 10 minutes.) I have certainly got my moneys worth out of this camera. The price point may seem a bit high to those who have not splurged on a DSLR before, but I can assure you that you will not be disappointed with the Canon t6. I have used this camera almost everyday, and it has survived light rain, bumping against walls, and even my friend accidentally dropping it.

The 18-55mm kit lens allows for the user to have a taste of a little bit of everything. At 18mm, the user can take some fantastic wide angle photos, such as landscapes. At 55mm, the user is able to take portraits. This lens is also capable to take photos at 22mm, which resembles the human eye. Now, this lens does produce crisp photos, but I would not recommend it for low light. Not with this camera at least. With an f stop at 4, and max ISO of 6400, you will produce rather noisey or underexposed photos. Luckily, these problems can usually be fixed post-process. The photo I have attached was taken at night, at f4.5 and ISO 3200. I used the street lamp to light her face, and she is standing in front of a Christmas tree. I have touched up the color and luminance noise, so that the noise is not quite as bad. So, as you can see, you are able to get decent low light photos.

As for the kit, I was not so pleased. First of all, the large tripod is decent. It has a good weight to it, but I do feel that the wind could knock it over. The small tripod is cute, and is actually very sturdy despite the size. I hardly ever get use of it, but it does make as a good grip. Second, the camera bag is very nice, and is quite roomy. I was able to fit the entire kit into the bag with no problem. If you plan on getting more lenses or adding to your kit, I would recommend just getting a backpack. I find that after long use, my shoulder would be sore from the strap digging in. Next, the wide angle and telephoto lens. These lenses are actually screwed to the front of the 18-55mm lens, and are not able to mount onto the body. I personally did not use these at all, and I feel that the kit could have been done without them. Now, the filters. I like these a lot. They do their job, and quite nicely as well. They are easy to clean with the provided microfiber. The remote for the camera comes in handy for those action and long exposure shots that people love. This remote is connected via a wire, which has a limiting length, but at least it works. As for the card reader, it works. The 16GB and 32GB cards do work, but it would be better to get cards with more storage. Or, at least get extra cards to conveniently have. Finally, the flash. The flash takes 2 AA batteries, which I never got around to buying. You might as well use the flash on the t6 itself, as I do not think this particular flash is worth carrying around.

Overall, I feel like the kit is very cheap. The only thing worthy of keeping is the camera (and strap), the bag, the cards (and wallet), the filters, the remote, and the cloth. The tripod can be useful, but I would rather just get one that weighs a bit more and feels more sturdy. Honestly, this kit is technically free with the camera, so I can't complain too much. On Canon's website itself, you would spend at least $500 on the camera and lens alone. Here, you can get that, and more, for $100 less. This is a great buy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Do not buy if you want to take outside
reviews.reviewText: I have had two Canon Rebels in the past few years. The first was a gift from my boyfriend who had it for several years with no issues. I took it snowshoeing a few days later and it worked great. It was not actively snowing or raining and camera worked fine the entire day. The next morning I attempted to turn my camera on and I got a generic error message. I tried everything (changing lens, battery, memory card, etc.) and took it to several experts, none of whom knew what was wrong and told me that the cost of fixing it would be more than buying a new one. So I bought a new Canon Rebel T6 and it worked great for maybe 9 months. I took it hiking many many times in all sorts of weather and precipitation levels (I live in Oregon so it rains a lot). Camera worked great. Then, I took it on a hike in the mountains with lots of snow. It worked great the entire time and did not get wet, as it was not actively snowing or raining. The next morning, camera wouldn't turn on. No error message or anything. So I took it to the store I bought it from because it was still under warranty. They sent it to Canon and a few weeks later, I got a message that it was irreparable and not covered under warranty due to "excessive water damage." I was shocked and extremely angry because it never got any wetter than a few rain drops and the day that it stopped working, it did not get wet at all. My boyfriend did the same hike with a Canon Mark II and his camera was totally fine. I am not sure if it was the cold temperatures or moisture in the air that ruined both my Canon Rebels or if they are just crap quality and decide to die randomly. Either way, I have spent way too much money on what appears to be a "disposable" camera that only lasts a few months. Unless you live in a perpetually sunny and dry area, do not buy this camera if you plan on taking it outside. Given that I only use my cameras to take nature photography when hiking, I will not be buying another Canon product. I am now looking into the weather-resistant Pentax cameras.
Do not order this product.

Ordered this package for 4 month study abroad journey. Battery charger won't even light up, let alone charge. I contacted seller and asked them to rush a new charger as my daughter is departing the first of the year. They didn't respond until AFTER they closed for the day, and want me to return the bad charger at my expense before they will ship the replacement. It is 12/17 today, and that makes it virtually impossible for me to get the replacement in time with the holidays approaching. I'm just going to return the whole package and purchase from another seller. Disappointing!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality! Great for my hobby!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use for a hobby. Picture quality is amazing and this deal is cheaper than you could get this stuff anywhere else. I was worried because of that but everything is really great quality and I use this camera more than my phone!

reviews.reviewTitle: COMES WITH A TON! PERFECT GIFT.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my little brother. I have not given it to him yet as his birthday is towards the end of this month. But the package was very well arranged came with everything and more than I expected. This is perfect for a gift and even more perfect for someone getting into photography.
